thread.title: CHOP’s Gender & Sexuality Development Clinic 10th Anniversary Celebration
thread.title_full: CHOP’s Gender & Sexuality Development Clinic 10th Anniversary Celebration

author: The Children's Hospital
title: CHOP’s Gender & Sexuality Development Clinic 10th Anniversary Celebration
text:
CHOP’s Gender & Sexuality Development Clinic 10th Anniversary Celebration
Roberts Center for Pediatric Research, 734 Schuylkill Ave, Conference Rooms 1120 A and B, Philadelphia, PA 19146
We invite you to a birthday party celebrating 10 years of CHOP’s Gender & Sexuality Development Clinic. This event is open to clinic patients and their families, as well as the CHOP leaders who have supported our program.
We want to honor the community we have fostered, demonstrate the program’s accomplishments and acknowledge the essential clinical and philanthropic support that makes our work possible.
We’ll provide lunch, along with speaker programming, activities and fun for your kids. Highlights will include an interactive wall, face painting, information tables, carnival games, photo booth, story time and more.
Roberts Center for Pediatric Research, 734 Schuylkill Ave, Philadelphia, PA 19146 | Conference Rooms 1120 A and B
This event is free to attend. Free parking in the outdoor Roberts Center lot will be provided.
To get an accurate head count, we ask that you RSVP in advance. Please RSVP by 5 p.m. on Thursday, October 10.
Please contact Anna Kiesnowski at
